channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2224|2024-08-04T07:01:41.171Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20project%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin 1.16 and earlier does not escape the node names shown in tooltips on the overview page of builds with a single axis, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2225|2024-08-04T07:01:41.253Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20project%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin 1.16 and earlier does not escape the axis names shown in tooltips on the overview page of builds with multiple axes, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.
